title: Plan for R&D Tax Credit
description: A tech startup wants to ensure it is properly documenting its expenses to qualify for the Research and Development (R&D) tax credit.

tasks.description: Explain the four-part test the IRS uses to define qualifying research activities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the eligibility criteria.

tasks.description: Review the company's projects to identify which activities likely qualify.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the company identify its qualifying research projects.

tasks.description: Advise the company on how to track and document qualifying research expenses (e.g., employee wages, supplies, contract research).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear action plan for documentation to support a future credit claim.
